experience: You and Greg both know Ike Nassi, Luke Hohmann, and 24 others
Business Development - AT&T, Expedia, SAIC, MasterCard, T-Mobile, GE, AMEX, Disney, Amazon, Schwab,

The Delphix Dynamic Data Platform allows data to be securely delivered to every stakeholder, across on-premise, cloud and hybrid environments at the speed and scale required to enable rapid development and delivery of applications and solutions.The platform provides the industry’s most comprehensive DataOps solution, enabling companies to easily deliver and secure data, wherever it exists.It reduces data friction by providing a collaborative platform for data operators (such as DBAs, InfoSec & IT Operations teams) and data consumers (such as developers, QA, Analysts and data scientists), ensuring that sensitive data is secured and that the right data is made available to the right people, when and where they need it.With Delphix, data is:• Fast: Provision data securely and in the required environments in minutes instead of hours, days, or months to enable IT transformation.• Secure: Secure sensitive data in adherence with security policies and ensure regulatory compliance.• Everywhere: Move and manage data from any environment – on-premises, cloud, or in hybrid environments, and seamlessly provision data where required.
Cisco, Sony, VMware, PayPal, Huawei-PRC, Oracle, American Express, HPE, HPI, Visa, Wells Fargo, eBay

Finding, developing, growing and ensuring Agile transformation success of Fortune 1000 accounts.  Quota carrying Global executive achieving at least 160% each year selling our SaaS solutions.  Presidents Club every year.  Sold $4MM in software to Huawei as first deal for Rally in China.  I work for companies that solve serious problems for companies.  The discussions occur at the VP level or higher because I believe an enterprise-wide implementation is necessary to fully realize the value of the solution my company offers.  IPO NYSE April, 2013  (RALY) . Rally was acquired by CA Technologies in July of 2015.

Hired to find a buyer for company with valuation of at least $100M or go after Tier A VC funding.  I found a buyer but valuation of only $68M, so we went out and got Tier A VC funding and eventually did an IPO 5 years later.
President Academic Site Council Aptos High School- Pajaro Valley Unified School District-

Elected position focused on creating a superior educational and growth experience for the children of Aptos.  Some of the important areas we have begun to focus on include:  We have started recognition programs for the students who work hard but do not achieve the highest grades.  Some students work extremely hard to get "C's" and do not get recognized like some of the kids who get all "A's".     We have focused on the English learners, children of migrant workers, ensuring they receive additional attention to help them prepare for college.  We are also focused on every student becoming proficient in Math.

Tracy Mills
Customer Relations Specialist at O'Brien Dental Lab, Inc.
April 27, 2015, Greg was senior to Tracy but didn’t manage directly

Tracy was responsible for inside sales for a large section of the US.  We were a start-up and Tracy not only worked hard and smart, she also achieved results.  Imagine trying to sell a brand new software product into a market that had industry leaders already owning the market.  But Tracy was successful through hard work, determination, great inter-personal skills and discipline.  Unfortunately, Tracy left before her first year anniversary when she moved out of town.  My highest recommendation is when I would readily rehire someone.  I would do that in a minute with Tracy.

summary: I am a Global sales and business development executive focused on high growth SaaS companies for the last 15 years.  I focus on customer success and work for companies that provide significant benefit to their customers with the latest technology.  Delphix is the next big thing in time to market with our virtualized database technology.  We are defining a new market.During my career I have achieved an average of 160% attainment each year.   I have achieved Presidents Club more than 94% of the time over the last 25+ years including the last 18 years in a row. I have continuously found and developed new multi-million dollar revenue streams by identifying disruptive business models for many of the companies I have worked for.  I have opened up new direct and indirect multi-million dollar revenue opportunities in Asia including China, India, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam, South Korea, Japan, also Australia/New Zealand, EMEA and Latin America for several software companies generating over $100M in new revenue over the last 19 years.Former Board member Cayenne Software - Singapore, Artisan Software, and mediadome.I helped three of my companies get acquired including Striva by Informatica, NEON by Progress and mediadome (Intel).  I have been actively involved in M&A for four of my companies.Companies have been funded by Kleiner Perkins, Greylock Partners, 3i, Intel Capital, Accel Partners, Mobius, Boulder Ventures, Advanced Technology Ventures, Leapfrog Ventures, Mohr Davidow, Barnard & Company and others.Early in career, part of Artificial Heart Research team at the Cleveland Clinic and Case Western Reserve Bioengineering Dept..  Studied computer science and operating systems with John Donovan and Stuart Madnick at MIT.  Also contributor to college textbooks on Biochemistry at John Carroll University and Marine Algae of California at Stanford University.  Studied photography with Ansel Adams, Cole Weston and Morley Baer when I was teaching photography.
name: Greg Crandall
title: Business Development at Delphix - Virtualizing, Governing, and Delivering Data on Demand
